mapper.insert: insert into StudyRecord (userId, planetId, operation) values (#{userId}, #{planetId}, #{operation})
mapper.select: select * from StudyRecord where userId = #{userId} and planetId = #{planetId} order by time desc limit 1
select * from StudyRecord where userId = #{userId} and operation = #{operation} order by time desc limit 1
select * from StudyRecord where planetId = #{planetId} order by time desc,id asc limit #{batchNum}, 15
select * from StudyRecord where userId = #{userId} and time between #{startTime} and #{stopTime} order by time asc
select s.* from StudyRecord s,Planet p where s.userId = #{userId} and s.planetId = p.id and p.galaxy = #{galaxy} and s.time between #{startTime} and #{stopTime} order by s.time asc
